channel.title: 2021 on Dallas-FASCA - FASCA Dallas Chapter
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 on Dallas-FASCA - FASCA Dallas Chapter

item.title: 2021 Chat with FBI agent - Mr. Hilliam
item.description: Nov. 7, a special person spend his precious time together with us. Mr. Hilliam, a FBI agent who has over 30-year experience dealing with crimes, currently hate crimes.

item.title: 2021 Secretary Elaine Chao speech in Houston
item.description: This past Saturday, October 24, 2021, a few of our Dallas FASCA members drove down to Houston to listen to Secretary Elaine Chao.

item.title: 2021 Taiwan Double Tenth Celebration
item.description: This past Sunday, October 10th, 22 FASCA members gathered at the Dallas Chinese Community Center for the annual Double Tenth Celebration.

item.title: FASCA - North Texas Food Bank
item.description: Saturday October 16, 2021, 11 FASCA members, 4 teachers and 5 parents came together to volunteer at the North Texas Food Bank.

item.title: First FASCA meeting for 2021-2022!
item.description: Today we had our first FASCA meeting for 2021-2022! We had about 35 FASCA members in attendance, along with our parents and teachers.
